This is good to listen to for those who heard the bias news on his statement and have repeated it improperly. This is Mr. Trumps statement on what he said, so unless your bent on calling him a liar, than maybe you will rethink your jumping on the band wagon. Unless you just aren't his fan and want to think badly of him without being fair. I as a Christian choose to believe his statement. I just believe it! I believe he will tell you if he thinks a certain way. He isn't afraid to talk. That is how he talks. He starts something and then will just trail off to what is important and not get bogged down. If you listen to him often you start adapting to how he talks and you get him. Those that haven't been interested in figuring Mr. Trump out are taking the wrong responses of people who are looking for any ammunition against him to destroy him twist his statements and quote them as factual. He said several times he didn't go down the path that others did on his statement and really can't believe that they would. To be truthful when I heard him say the statement, my mind didn't come to that conclusion and when others started saying he said that, it turned my stomach to think they would accuse him of that and I wondered on how their mind works. Tonight got us back on track. I give koodoos to Fox and Hannity to put an end to what Megyn started.
